The Controller in the web Model-View-Controller (web-MVC) design is responsible for answering to web requests.
The Model in the web Model-View-Controller (web-MVC) design provides object-relational access to data stored in a relational database management system (RDBMS).
The View in the web Model-Controller-View (web-MVC) design renders a response HTML page, based on input it receives from a Controller.
